TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed DeviceFilterElement extends System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement
Public NotInheritable Class DeviceFilterElement Inherits ConfigurationElement

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("The System.Web.Mobile.dll assembly has been deprecated and should no longer be used. For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=157231.")

summary.span: 表示要应用于应用程序的设备特定的筛选器。

span.span: Represents a device-specific filter to be applied to the application.

summary.span: 有关如何开发 ASP.NET 移动应用程序的信息，请参阅 [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) 网站。

span.span: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此类对应于``元素``ASP.NET 设置架构的一部分。This class corresponds to the `` element for the `` section of the ASP.NET settings schema. 筛选器可以比较筛选器或计算器筛选器。A filter can be either a comparison filter or an evaluator filter. 基于比较的筛选器开发人员指定的设备功能的当前值在运行时的值进行比较。Comparison-based filters compare a value specified by the developer to the current value of a device capability at run time. 计算器 （或基于委托的） 筛选器使用的程序员指定类的方法来执行计算。The evaluator (or delegate-based) filter uses a method from a programmer-specified class to perform the evaluation.

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.
